T03n865u_001:2: dānabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 1 ||
T03n865u_001:4: śīlabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 2 ||
T03n865u_001:6: kṣāntibalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 3 ||
T03n865u_001:8: vīryabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 4 ||
T03n865u_001:10: dhyānabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 5 ||
T03n865u_001:12: prajñabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 6 ||
